Class ColorSetting ¶

Synopsis

Attributes
r

number The amount of Red from a range of 0 to 1
g

number The amount of Green from a range of 0 to 1
b

number The amount of Blue from a range of 0 to 1
a

number The amount of Opacity from a range of 0 to 1
alphaVisible

boolean alphaVisible Should the opacity slider be availible
rainbow

boolean Is this color rainbow
rainbowSpeed

number The speed of the rainbow effect (default=0.003)
ColorSetting.r ¶

number The amount of Red from a range of 0 to 1

ColorSetting.g ¶

number The amount of Green from a range of 0 to 1

ColorSetting.b ¶

number The amount of Blue from a range of 0 to 1

ColorSetting.a ¶

number The amount of Opacity from a range of 0 to 1

ColorSetting.alphaVisible ¶

boolean alphaVisible Should the opacity slider be availible

ColorSetting.rainbow ¶

boolean Is this color rainbow

ColorSetting.rainbowSpeed ¶

number The speed of the rainbow effect (default=0.003)
